about_the_game:
The soundtrack to Monster Hunter Rise: Sunbreak expands onto Steam!

This digital soundtrack includes 67 tracks comprised of music from the epic Monster Hunter Rise: Sunbreak expansion, including several new jingles, hunting themes, grandiose monster anthems, and the "Sunbreak" vocal theme.

The soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
